turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Good Morning, I need a coffee drink. Can you take the order please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok no problem can I know the location where you can receive the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes off course, the location is 159-27 jamaica Ave. Jamaica, NY 11432

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want brewed coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want milk with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want milk with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any cream with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want also little amount of cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want mid-size cup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have splenda?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No we don't have splenda.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So what kind of sweetner do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have equal.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok can you put 2 equal sweetner with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Off course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok nice, how long to get my coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok it can take like 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any other question Sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually what types of cream you have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have different coffee cream, like caramel, chocolate, hazelnut, vanilla and others.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok nice, please give me vanilla cream for my coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Sir, Do you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you please make it extra hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Sir.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
